author: nflaig
content:
Based on discussion in https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1423741917769891891 and https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1424982105821020242 it seems we can move ahead with deprecating `/eth/v1/beacon/blob_sidecars/{block_id}` endpoint, opened a PR https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/560 to also have this noted in the changelog / release notes.

I would suggest we cut a proper release to get more visibility on the latest spec.
